children.summary: Gets the runtime skip reason for the test, inspecting the provided exception to see if it contractually matches a "dynamically skipped" exception (that is, any exception message that starts with ). If the exception does not match the pattern, consults the base skip reason (from ), as well as and to determine if the test should be dynamically skipped.
